de.engehausen.treemap
Interface IRectangle<N>

Type Parameters:
N - the type of node the rectangle supports.
All Known Implementing Classes:
RectangleImpl
public interface IRectangle<N>

Represents the rectangle in a tree map.

Method Summary
 boolean contains(int x, int y)
          Checks if the given coordinate lies inside of the area of the rectangle.
 int getHeight()
          Returns the height of the rectangle.
 N getNode()
          Returns the node belonging to this rectangle.
 int getWidth()
          Returns the width of the rectangle.
 int getX()
          Returns the horizontal component of the starting point of the rectangle.
 int getY()
          Returns the vertical component of the starting point of the rectangle.

contains

boolean contains(int x,
                 int y)
Checks if the given coordinate lies inside of the area of the rectangle.

Parameters:
x - the horizontal component of the point to check.
y - the vertical component of the point to check.
Returns:
true if the pointed is contained in the rectangle, false otherwise.
